ch0091_10_shirona/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I was just
thinking about you.
ch0091_10_shirona/0101_0701_02_10:
Because I think spending time with you has been
making us stronger.
ch0091_10_shirona/7101_0701_01_10:
You know that moment of tension between you
and your opponent just before a battle?
ch0091_10_shirona/7101_0701_02_10:
I always wonder what Pokémon they’ll send out
and what moves they’ll use...and my heart begins
to race!
ch0091_10_shirona/7101_0701_03_10:
In fact, it may be that very moment that makes me
so focused and excited about Pokémon battles.
ch0091_10_shirona/7102_0701_01_10:
When challenging a strong opponent with all their
heart and soul...
ch0091_10_shirona/7102_0701_02_10: both people and Pokémon shine, full of life!
ch0091_10_shirona/7102_0701_03_10:
That’s why I continue to seek out
formidable opponents.
ch0091_10_shirona/7103_0701_01_10:
In this outfit, I might give a different impression
than usual...
ch0091_10_shirona/7103_0701_02_10:
But I think it’s perfect for a person traveling to
hone her battle skills.
ch0091_10_shirona/7104_0701_01_10:
I think there are a lot of different things that are
important and necessary for getting stronger.
ch0091_10_shirona/7104_0701_02_10: Like, for example, always truly loving Pokémon.
ch0091_10_shirona/7104_0701_03_10: I can tell you that from experience.
ch0091_10_shirona/7105_0701_01_10:
In order to win battles, two things are absolutely
necessary: love for your Pokémon and calm
decision-making.
ch0091_10_shirona/7105_0701_02_10:
You have both that passion and that calm
demeanor, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0091_10_shirona/7105_0701_03_10: I’m sure you’ll grow even stronger in the future!
ch0091_10_shirona/1701_0701_01_10:
I thought this might be of use to you, so I brought
it along with me!
ch0091_10_shirona/1701_0702_01_10:
I’m always cheering you on, so I hope you know
you can rely on me if you’re ever in trouble.
ch0091_10_shirona/2501_0701_01_10:
In the Sinnoh region, there’s a facility called the
Battle Tower where people can compete.
ch0091_10_shirona/2501_0701_02_10: There’s something similar in the Alola region, too.
ch0091_10_shirona/2501_0701_03_10:
Have you ever been to a facility like that, where
you can aim for the pinnacle of Pokémon battling?
ch0091_10_shirona/2501_0702_01_10:
What can I do to reach even loftier heights than
achieving the title of Sinnoh Champion?
ch0091_10_shirona/2501_0702_02_10:
No matter how hard I think about it, I come
up empty.
ch0091_10_shirona/2501_0702_03_10: The answer must lie in battle—nowhere else.
ch0091_10_shirona/2511_0701_01_10:
I’ve often thought it would be nice to have a
chance to meet with the Champions of each region
and compete to see who’s strongest.
ch0091_10_shirona/2511_0701_02_10: And now Pasio has made my dream a reality.
ch0091_10_shirona/2511_0701_03_10:
Here in this land of dreams, I’m determined to
prove that I’m the strongest!
ch0091_10_shirona/2511_0702_01_10:
Even Lucario seems to be feeling more motivated
since we’ve come to Pasio.
ch0091_10_shirona/2511_0702_02_10:
I’m sure that’s partly because he understands how
I’m feeling, but...
ch0091_10_shirona/2511_0702_03_10:
Could it be that Lucario also wants to prove that
he’s the strongest?
ch0091_10_shirona/3001_0701_01_10:
When I think about all the encounters and battles
that are waiting for me today, I can hardly
contain my excitement.
ch0091_10_shirona/3003_0701_01_10:
It’s important to not push yourself when you’re
tired. We all need a break, and there’s still plenty
of time left in the day!
ch0091_10_shirona/3005_0701_01_10:
When the cool evening breeze hits, it helps me
relieve the tension after a long day of battling.
